func.title: GetPlrKnowledge

param.name: player
param.desc: Player whose construction plans you want to determine.

param.name: id
param.desc: If specified, the function returns true, if the player has the construction plan of the specified object.

param.name: index
param.desc: Specify only if id is not 0.

param.name: category
param.desc: Specify only if id is not 0.

func.desc: With id specified the function returns true if the player has the construction plan of the specified object. In this case index and category are ignored. If id is 0, the function returns the indicated construction plan of the specified category.

example.text: Displays a message if the first player has the construction plan for wind generators.
example.code: var def = GetPlrKnowledge( 0,nil,4,C4D_Structure); Log("The fifth construction plan of the first player is for ID "%i"",def);
